SELECT SG_NO, M.M_NO, M.NICKNAME, GROUP_NM, GROUP_DESC, SG_CATEGORY, MEMBER_CNT, CREATE_DATE, MOD_DATE, DELETE_DATE FROM STUDY_GROUP S LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON S.M_NO = M.M_NO
WHERE S.GROUP_NM like '%${searchValue}%' OR S.GROUP_DESC like '%${searchValue}%' OR S.SG_CATEGORY like '%${searchValue}%'
AND S.GROUP_NM like '%${GROUP_NM}%' OR S.GROUP_DESC like '%${GROUP_DESC}%'
ORDER BY S.SG_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_GROUP(SG_NO, M_NO, GROUP_NM, GROUP_DESC, SG_CATEGORY, MEMBER_CNT, CREATE_DATE, MOD_DATE) VALUES(0, #{memberNo}, #{groupName}, #{groupDesc}, #{groupCategory}, #{memberCnt}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDY_GROUP SET GROUP_NM = #{groupName}, GROUP_DESC = #{groupDesc}, MEMBER_CNT = #{memberCnt}, MOD_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE SG_NO = #{studyGroupNo}
